overview: Picture  In 2011 Alan wrote, produced and starred in the 15 min dark comedy film THE WINKING BOY.  The Winking Boy tells the story of Martin a man who enjoys a lifestyle of leisure at Calm Springs Rehabilitation Centre, having fooled everyone into believing he is completely paralysed. However when a new nurse arrives upsetting the hospital dynamics, Martin's plan starts to come unstuck.
title: The Winking Boy
